    • Method Detail

      • getPicture

        public org.apache.poi.hwpf.usermodel.Picture getPicture(int pictureOffset)
        Get a picture at a certain offset and remove it from the store (so this method may only be called once for each picture)
        Parameters:
        pictureOffset - an integer obtained from CharacterRun.getPicOffset()
        Returns:
        The picture linked to the given CharacterRun or null if no such picture exists

      • putPictureToConvert

        public void putPictureToConvert(java.lang.String currentFilename,
                                java.lang.String expectedFilename,
                                int expectedWidth,
                                int expectedHeight)
        Store mappings for files which could not be converted (e.g. EMF and friends)
        Parameters:
        currentFilename - Filename as it is currently stored on disk
        expectedFilename - Filename as it is referred to in the reqif output
        expectedWidth - resulting width of the file as expected in the reqif output (relevant for vector data)
        expectedHeight - resulting height of the file as expected in the reqif output (relevant for vector data)
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - one of the parameters is null

      • putShapeToConvert

        public void putShapeToConvert(int rangeStartOffset,
                              java.lang.String expectedFilename)
        Store mappings for shapes which can not be extracted
        Parameters:
        rangeStartOffset - start offset of the range which contains the shape
        expectedFilename - Filename as it is referred to in the reqif output
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - one of the parameters is null

      • writeUnwrittenPictures

        public int writeUnwrittenPictures(java.lang.String outputDir)
        Write all pictures which were not referenced in the main document into a file
        Parameters:
        outputDir - directory where the files shall be written
        Returns:
        the number of files written
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the argument is null or malformed

      • writeImageConversionFile

        public int writeImageConversionFile(java.lang.String outputFilename)
        Create a CRLF-terminated file (batch-script, csv, ...) which can be used to convert all the image data
        Parameters:
        outputFilename - filename where the file shall be written
        Returns:
        the number of images to be converted; if == 0 then no batch file will be written
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the output script could not be written

      • writeShapeConversionFile

        public int writeShapeConversionFile(java.lang.String outputFilename)
        Create a CRLF-terminated file (csv) which can be used to convert all the image data
        Parameters:
        outputFilename - filename where the file shall be written
        Returns:
        the number of images to be converted; if == 0 then no batch file will be written
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the output script could not be written
